### shouldScheduleVOPDAdjacent() {#ad07ebf0671a72f8469ed76bab0846ac2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool shouldScheduleVOPDAdjacent (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp; TII, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetsubtargetinfo">TargetSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; TSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; FirstMI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; SecondMI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the instr pair, FirstMI and SecondMI, should be scheduled together.

Given SecondMI, when FirstMI is unspecified, then check if SecondMI may be part of a fused pair at all.

Definition at line <a href="#l00123">123</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnvopdutils-cpp">GCNVOPDUtils.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Adapts design from MacroFusion</span></CodeLine>
